body.name: Chicco PhysioForma 100% Silicone Mini Glow in The Dark Pacifier for Babies Aged 2-6 Months | Orthodontic Nipple Supports Breathing | BPA & Latex Free | Reusable Sterilizing Case | Clear, 2pk

features: Extra-light, ultra-small, easy to find shield for a barely-there feel on newborn baby’s face
Developed for comfort, breathing and orthodontic benefits
Extra-soft, satin-textured silicone nipple to help baby stay latched and keep pacifier in mouth
Included reusable case for sterilizing pacifiers in just 3 minutes in the microwave
Designed and made in Italy. BPA and LATEX Free
Glows in the dark, making it easy to locate pacifier at night
body.description: Finally, a pacifier that soothes babies and glows in the dark for parents too! Silicone Mini is an extra light, ultra-small, easy to find orthodontic pacifier that was designed especially for young babies. Loved by newbies - Mini has a 96% acceptance rate*. The Mini pacifier isn’t just for pacifying, but is also developed for comfort, breathing and orthodontic benefits. Clinical studies show that PhysioForma pacifiers actively support baby’s breathing by positioning the tongue forward to maintain an open airway, which is especially important during sleep. Physiological breathing improves quality of sleep and reduces irritability.The unique angle and lateral curve of the nipple evenly distribute tongue pressure across baby's palate. Tiny ridges and an inclined nipple shape guide proper tongue placement. Together, these important features support baby's growing palate and teeth.Gentle against baby's delicate skin, the soft silicone shield is comfortable and breathable. Ventilation holes promote air circulation & help reduce moisture buildup.One-piece silicone construction conforms to the American Academy of Pediatrics’ guidelines for pacifier usage. Another benefit of the one-piece design - parents can insert finger inside the nipple for extra bonding with baby.The exclusive PhysioForma nipple design was developed, tested, and approved in partnership with an advisory panel of leading neonatologists, pediatricians, and orthodontists.Available for babies 2 to 6m. Reusable sterilizing carry case included. Glows in the dark for nighttime use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Perfect Fit for baby's comfort Our smallest and lightest shield for a barely-there feel on newborn baby’s face! Soft, flexible, high quality silicone pacifier is comfortable & breathable. Fits baby's little face perfectly & helps reduce moisture buildup with a contoured shield and 4 ventilation holes for air circulation. Plus, an extra-soft silicone nipple helps baby stay latched and keep pacifier in mouth - for more comfort & less slip! Exclusive Nipple Design for baby's breathing Clinical studies show PhysioForma pacifiers actively support baby's breathing. Our exclusive nipple (developed, tested & approved in partnership with an advisory panel of neonatologists, pediatricians & orthodontists) helps position baby's tongue forward to maintain an open airway. Orthodontic Design for baby’s oral development Unique angle and lateral curve of the nipple evenly distribute tongue pressure across baby's palate. Tiny ridges and an inclined nipple shape guide proper tongue placement. Together, these important features support baby's growing palate and teeth! One-piece Construction for safety and hygiene Made from one hundred percent food-grade silicone means there are no parts that can break apart & there is nowhere for germs to hide. One-piece pacifier adheres to the guidelines of the American Academy of Pediatrics. Another benefit of this design - parents can insert finger inside the nipple for extra bonding with baby. Included Sterilizing Case for cleanliness In addition to being handy storage for baby's pacis, you can also use the included case uses the power of steam. Our case lets you steam pacifiers in the microwave in just 3 minutes!

Accessorize your PhysioForma Chicco Pocket Buddies Soft loveys make the perfect snuggle buddies and keep baby's paci close by. Attach pacifier to hand, tail or store in the roomy belly pocket. Chicco Pacifier Clips Fashionable clips keep baby's pacis clean and within reach. Universal clips attach any style pacifier to baby's clothing, diaper bags, purses & more. Chicco Paci-Roo Storage Case Handy storage/travel case keeps pacis clean at home & on-the-go. Secure zipper & velcro strap for attaching to diaper bags, purses, strollers & more! Choose Your Favorite Buddy Cuddly Pocket Buddies are available in 4 friends: Bunny, Elephant, Fox & Bear. Perfect for the paci stage and beyond. Long lasting. Machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glow lasts all night
reviews.reviewText: The glow from the pacifiers lasts all night. I was worried that was a gimmick and would only last an hour or two once you put them to bed. However, the glow lasts well over 10 hours. It's easy to spot the pacifier in the dark of the early mornings.Easy to clean.The container is easy to use and small for carrying on the go. Works well in the microwave to sterilize the pacifiers.The hollow nipple is a bit of a catch-all with animal hair, lint, and dust which is hard to clean out when you are not near a sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these and it’s great they come in a mini size as well. I typically prefer the more standard paci over the silicone but these hold up so well and are shaped nicely. Easy to sterilize and you don’t have to worry about them trapping water. The glow and the dark feature on these is nice and bright unlike others I’ve tried. I love Chicco products. They put a lot of thought and effort into their designs. I also live their cases they come in, they are very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandbaby chose this one. Need to clean often but it's easy to do. Love that it glows in the dark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son’s favorite!
reviews.reviewText: My son will only use this pacifier, I’ve bought 3 sets and honestly it gives me peace of mind when it comes to SIDS. Love that it glows in the dark, makes it easier to find when we’re sleepy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The only pacifer my baby will use
reviews.reviewText: These pacifiers are the only ones my baby will use. They are super easy to wash by hand but also come with a sanitizing case making it super easy to keep them clean and protected. I will say that we have never been able to get them to glow in the dark so if you do drop them it can be harder to find them due to the clear color but still worth it. The shape of the pacifier also makes it easy for my baby to get a good latch so it isn't constantly falling out of his mouth. Overall great option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only pacifier breastfed baby would even consider
reviews.reviewText: Only pacifier breastfed baby would even considerRecommend 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only paci our daughter uses
reviews.reviewText: These are great. They don’t pop out as easily and they glow in the dark, making it easier to find them in the dark. The price point is great, too. We ordered several of these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can be found In the dark
reviews.reviewText: My lil guy has liked these paci’s from day 1. The glow in the dark ones are perfect so you can find them in dark after they’ve fallen out.
